Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

Train your commanders in how the bodies of defeated enemies can be optimized for use by the Xenoplague virus.[br/][br/]The chance of Xenoplague units spawning or evolving is increased by {PlagueInfectionChance} for each hero you have in battle.
训练你的指挥官，使其能够以最优方式将被击败的敌人尸体用于异星疫病病毒。[br/][br/]你在战斗中每拥有一个英雄，生成或进化异星疫病单位的几率提升 {PlagueInfectionChance}。

Xenoplague science allows for the scavenging of biomatter for regenerative purposes.[br/][br/]After every victorious battle, units in Xenoplague armies heal for {Healing}[hp/] per killed Biological or Cyborg unit.
异星疫病科技可以回收生化物质来恢复再生。[br/][br/]每次战斗胜利后，每击杀一个生物或半机械人单位，异星疫病军队中的单位就能治疗 {Healing}[hp/]。

By unleashing a hyper-intelligent virus onto our population, we can boost scientific progress. In the long run, this will help us further the development of the Omega strain.[br/][br/]{ResearchIncome}[research/] in your colonies.
向我们的民众释放超智能病毒，提升科学进度。从长远意义上讲，这将进一步帮助我们研究终极毒株。[br/][br/]你的殖民地获得 {ResearchIncome}[research/]。

To further our cause, we will enforce that all of our troops be infected with the Xeno-strain. This is a unique infection of the Xeno-strain and will not weaken our troops as it grows within them.[br/][br/]Losing units in battle while this Doctrine is active will contribute to spawning Xenoplague Pustules and evolving other Xenoplague units at the end of combat.
为了壮大我们的事业，我们将强制所有部队感染异星毒株。这是一种特殊的异星毒株传染物，并不会削弱我们的部队实力。[br/][br/]激活此教义时，阵亡的单位在战斗结束时将有助于生成异星疫病脓包并进化其他异星疫病单位。

Target Biological or Cyborg unit takes {ViralInfectionDamage} damage and has a strength {ViralInfectionStrength} chance to contract a [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred]. The effect jumps up to {ViralInfectionJumps} times to a nearby target within {ViralInfectionRange} hexes.
目标生物或半机械人单位受到 {ViralInfectionDamage} 伤害并有 {ViralInfectionStrength} 力量几率感染[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]。该效果还会弹跳至 {ViralInfectionJumps} 个单元格内的其他单位，最多跳转 {ViralInfectionRange} 次。

Launches a spore pod into tactical combat that bursts on impact with the ground. The pod deals {BioDamage} damage in a {radius} hex radius area of effect with [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred]. The spore pod leaves behind a Bloated Pustule unit on the impact hex. The unit is destroyed at end of combat.
在战术战斗中发射能够在接触地面时爆炸的孢子舱。舱体对 {radius} 个单元格范围造成 {BioDamage} 伤害和[abilityred]高度冲击[/abilityred]。孢子舱会在冲击单元格中留下一个浮肿脓包单位，该单位将在战斗结束后被摧毁。

Target Xenoplague unit is healed for {HyperMutationHeal} and all negative Status Effects are dispelled. The target also gains {ResistanceAll} resistance to all damage channels and increased [abilityblue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityblue] for {BuffDuration}.
目标异星疫病单位治疗 {HyperMutationHeal} 并驱散身上所有的负面状态效果，此外对所有伤害类型获得 {ResistanceAll} 抵抗并获得更高的[abilityblue]动摇抵抗[/abilityblue]，持续 {BuffDuration}。
Unit has {ResistanceAll} resistance to all damage and increased [abilityblue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityblue].
单位对所有伤害类型拥有 {ResistanceAll} 抵抗和更高的[abilityblue]动摇抵抗[/abilityblue]。

Target non-Xenoplague Biological or Cyborg unit and {UnstableContaminationJumpMax} other units within {UnstableContaminationJumpRange} hexes take {UnstableContaminationDamage}[damageBio/] and have a {UnstableContaminationChance} strength chance to gain [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] and [abilityred]Unstable Contamination[/abilityred] until the end of combat, causing them to explode upon death.

目标非异星疫病生物单位或半机械人单位和 {UnstableContaminationJumpRange} 个单元格内的 {UnstableContaminationJumpMax} 个其他单位受到 {UnstableContaminationDamage}[damageBio/] 伤害并有 {UnstableContaminationChance} 力量几率遭到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]和[abilityred]不稳定污染[/abilityred]，持续至战斗结束，使其在死亡后会发生爆炸。
{UnstableContaminationStrength} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Unstable Contamination[/abilityred] to target non-Xenoplague Biological or Cyborg unit.
有 {UnstableContaminationStrength} 力量几率向目标生物或半机械人单位施加[abilityred]不稳定污染[/abilityred]。

This unit will explode on death, dealing {UnstableContaminationDeathDamage} damage with a strength {UnstableContaminationDeathInfectResist} chance to cause [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred].
该单位在死亡后会发生爆炸，造成 {UnstableContaminationDeathDamage} 伤害并有 {UnstableContaminationDeathInfectResist} 力量几率造成[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]。

Target non-Mindless Xenoplague unit and up to {UnitAmount} Xenoplague units within {HexRange} hexes heal for {HealAmount}[hp/] and go [abilityblue]Rabid[/abilityblue] for {duration}. Rabid units are no longer under your control, and automatically attack the nearest enemy unit. In addition, the unit deals {RabidDam} extra damage, is immune to Status Effects, gains {RabidHP} maximum [hp/] and [abilityblue]Fast Movement.[/abilityblue]

{HexRange} 个单元格内的目标非无意识异星疫病单位以及最多 {UnitAmount} 个异星疫病单位恢复 {HealAmount}[hp/] 并变得[abilityblue]狂暴[/abilityblue]，持续 {duration}。狂暴单位不再受你的控制，而是会自动攻击最近的敌方单位。此外，该单位还会额外造成 {RabidDam} 伤害且免疫状态效果，获得 {RabidHP} 最大 [hp/] 和[abilityblue]快速移动[/abilityblue]。

This unit has lost control and will attack the nearest enemy. It deals {RabidDamage} extra damage, has {RabidHp} maximum [hp/], is immune to Status Effects, and has [abilityblue]Fast Movement[/abilityblue].
该单位已失控并且会攻击最近的敌人，额外造成 {RabidDamage} 伤害且拥有 {RabidHp} 的最大[hp/]，免疫状态效果，拥有[abilityblue]快速移动[/abilityblue]。
This unit jumps forward {hex} hexes. When targeting an enemy non-Heavy unit, it deals damage and pushes the unit back, taking their place.
该单位向前跳跃 {hex} 个单元格。以敌方非重型单位为目标时，该单位会造成伤害并将目标击退并占据其所在位置。
This unit is immune to negative Morale effects and cannot be Mind Controlled.
该单位免疫负面士气效果且无法被心灵控制。
The creature self-destructs, dealing damage to all adjacent hexes.
该生物进行自我摧毁，对所有相邻单元格造成伤害。

The creature automatically self-destructs on death, dealing damage to all adjacent hexes, with a {ParasiticInfectionChance} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg units.
该生物在死亡时会自动自毁，对所有相邻单元格造成伤害并有 {ParasiticInfectionChance} 力量几率向生物和半机械人单位施加[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]。
Rip into the enemy unit with sharp fangs.
Strike the target enemy unit with spiked tentacles.
用带有尖刺的触须攻击目标敌方单位。
Ranged Biochemical attack that melts armor.
能够融化护甲的远程生化攻击。
The unit has +{HyperEvolvedImmuneSystemResist} resistance against all non-Psionic Status Effects.
该单位对所有非灵能状态效果拥有 +{HyperEvolvedImmuneSystemResist} 抵抗。
Heal {VoraciousHungerHP} on killing Biological or Cyborg units.
击杀生物或半机械人单位时治疗 {VoraciousHungerHP}。
Launch serrated spikes from the tips of tentacles that are dripping with a infectious liquid.
使用滴淌着传染液体的触须尖发动锯齿尖刺攻击。
Fire an infected spike at target enemy.
使用传染尖刺攻击目标敌人。
{StunChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance to [abilityred]Stun[/abilityred] a Biological or Cyborg unit for {Stuntime}. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Staggered[/abilityred] instead.
有 {StunChance}[StrengthBio/] 力量几率[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]生物或者半机械人单位，持续 {Stuntime}。如果被抵抗，则施加[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。
Reanimate a friendly dead Xenoplague unit using a concentrated bundle of parasitic spores.
使用浓缩寄生孢子复活友方阵亡的异星疫病单位。
This unit and all friendly adjacent Biological and Cyborg units gain [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue], healing {RegenerativeSporeCloudHP}[hp/] each turn in combat.
该单位和所有相邻的友方生物和半机械人单位获得[abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue]，在战斗中每回合治疗 {RegenerativeSporeCloudHP}[hp/]。
All Xenoplague creatures heal for {HealAmount} of their maximum [hp/] at the end of each battle. This includes units modded with certain Xenoplague mods.
每次战斗结束时，所有异星疫病生物治疗 {HealAmount} 的最大[hp/]，包括装备有异星疫病模块的单位。

The unit is infected with a strain of Xenoplague and gains [abilityblue]Hyper-evolved Immune System[/abilityblue], granting it +{resistancehyperevo} resistance to all non-Psionic Status Effects, and [abilityblue]Ferocious Determination[/abilityblue], making the unit immune to negative morale and Mind Control effects.
该单位受到异星疫病毒株感染，获得[abilityblue]超进化免疫系统[/abilityblue]，对所有非灵能状态效果获得+{resistancehyperevo}抵抗以及[abilityblue]残酷决心[/abilityblue]，免疫负面士气和心灵控制效果。
Throw Plague Pods at the target, dealing Biochemical damage in a {hexrad} hex radius. Xenoplague units in that area are instead healed for {PlaguePodsHP}.
向目标投射瘟疫舱，对 {hexrad} 个单元格范围造成生化伤害。该范围内的异星疫病单位则能治疗 {PlaguePodsHP}。

Inject target Biological or Cyborg unit with a specific concoction of purifying spores. The target is healed for {BioSporesPurificationHP} and all negative Status Effects are cleared.[br/][br/]Mechanical units with Xenoplague upgrades can also be affected.
将特殊的净化孢子混合物注入目标生物或半机械人单位体内，治疗 {BioSporesPurificationHP}并清除所有负面状态效果。
The unit gains {ParasiticHybridHP}, {ParasiticHybridDef}, [abilityblue]Hyper-evolved Immune System[/abilityblue] and [abilityblue]Ferocious Determination[/abilityblue].
该单位获得 {ParasiticHybridHP}、{ParasiticHybridDef}、[abilityblue]超进化免疫系统[/abilityblue]和[abilityblue]残酷决心[/abilityblue]。

Releases a burst of spores from the unit, driving the unit and all friendly Biological and Cyborg units with {distance} hexes into [abilityblue]Hyper Aggression[/abilityblue], increasing their damage by {HyperAggressionDamage} for {HyperAggressionTurns}.[br/][br/]Mechanical units with Xenoplague upgrades can also be affected.
该单位释放出一阵孢子，使该单位及其周围 {distance} 单元格内的所有友方生物和半机械人单位获得[abilityblue]超级入侵[/abilityblue]，提升 {HyperAggressionDamage} 伤害，持续 {HyperAggressionTurns}。[br/][br/]具有异星疫病升级的机械单位也会受到影响。
The unit's damage is increased by {HyperAggressionDam}.
Resurrect target friendly Biological or Cyborg unit. If used on a non-Xenoplague corpse, the unit will return as a Xenoplague unit.
复活目标友方生物或半机械人单位。如果对非异星疫病单位尸体使用，该单位将作为异星疫病单位复活。

The unit is infected with a strong strain of Xenoplague and gains:[br/][abilityblue]Hyper Evolved Immune System[/abilityblue], granting it +{resistancehyperevo} resistance to all non-Psionic Status Effects.[br/][abilityblue]Ferocious Determination[/abilityblue], granting it immunity to negative Morale and Mind Control effects.[br/][abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue], granting it {hpregen} regeneration per combat turn and full [hp/] recovery per turn in the world map.[br/][abilityblue]Regenerative Spore Cloud[/abilityblue], granting all friendly adjacent Biological and Cyborg units [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue].

单位受到强大的异星疫病毒株感染，获得：[br/][abilityblue]超进化免疫系统[/abilityblue]，对所有非灵能状态效果获得 +{resistancehyperevo} 抵抗。[br/][abilityblue]残酷决心[/abilityblue]，使该单位免疫负面士气和心灵控制效果。[br/][abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue]，使得该单位在每个战斗回合获得 {hpregen} 恢复力，并且在世界地图中每回合恢复全部[hp/]。[br/][abilityblue]恢复孢子云[/abilityblue]，使所有相邻友方生物和半机械人单位获得[abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue]。
This unit has been infected by the Xenoplague.
该单位已被异星疫病感染。
{supplyPenalty}[supply/] income.[br/]Biological and Cyborg non-Xenoplague units heal {healPenalty}[hp/] less every strategic [turn/].
{supplyPenalty}[supply/] 收益。[br/]非异星疫病生物和半机械人单位在每个战略 [turn/] 获得的治疗减少 {healPenalty}[hp/]。
This unit heals {healBonus} less per turn on the world map.
该单位每回合在世界地图上获得的治疗减少 {healBonus}。

{supplyPenalty}[supply/] income.[br/]Biological and Cyborg non-Xenoplague units heal {healPenalty}[hp/] less every strategic [turn/].[br/]Xenoplague units gain [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue/].
{supplyPenalty}[supply/] 收益。[br/]非异星疫病生物和半机械人单位在每个战略 [turn/] 获得的治疗减少 {healPenalty}[hp/]。[br/]异星疫病单位获得[abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue/]。

{supplyPenalty}[supply/] income.[br/]Biological and Cyborg non-Xenoplague units heal {healPenalty}[hp/] less every strategic [turn/] and have [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred].[br/]Xenoplague units gain [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue/].
{supplyPenalty}[supply/] 收益。[br/]非异星疫病生物和半机械人单位在每个战略 [turn/] 获得的治疗减少 {healPenalty}[hp/] 并具有[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]。[br/]异星疫病单位获得[abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue/]。
Infect a non-Xenoplague enemy colony and the surrounding area with the Omega Strain for {duration}, a powerful viral agent that strengthens in effect as you build more Omega Hives.
使用终极毒株感染一个敌方非异星疫病殖民地及其周边地区，持续 {duration}。终极毒株是一种强大病毒体，你建造的终极蜂巢数量越多，其效果就越强。
Our agents have successfully unleashed the Omega Strain in the target colony. Already the population sicken and wither as the virus begins its work.
我们的特工已成功在目标殖民地释放终极毒株。随着毒株开始发挥作用，当地民众已身患疾病，衰弱不堪。

Our agents have been caught attempting to unleash the Omega Strain in the enemy colony. Though they were not entirely successful, some of the virus got into the local water system, causing some panic.
我们的特工尝试在敌方殖民地释放终极毒株时被抓住了。尽管他们没有大获成功，但部分病毒还是进入了当地供水系统，造成了恐慌。
Enemy agents have unleashed some sort of powerful viral agent in one of our colonies. The disease is spreading rapidly, poisoning crops and sickening the populace.
敌方特工在我们的一个殖民地中释放了某种强大的病毒。疾病迅速传播，不仅毒害了庄稼，还使民众纷纷患上了疾病。

Enemy agents have been caught attempting to unleash some sort of powerful viral agent in one of our colonies. While we managed to prevent them doing too much damage, some of the agent leaked into the water systems and has caused some panic.
敌方特工在尝试向我们的一个殖民地释放某种强大病毒体时被抓住了。虽然我们阻止了他们造成更多伤害，但部分病毒仍然进入了供水系统并且造成了恐慌。

The Omega Hive unlocks the Omega Strain Doomsday Weapon. Each additional Omega Hive that you build increases the level of the weapon, making it stronger.[br/][br/]Only one Omega Hive may be built per colony.
终极蜂巢可以解锁末日武器“终极毒株”。每额外建造一个终极蜂巢，该武器就会升级并变得更加强大。[br/][br/]每个殖民地只能建造一个终极蜂巢。
The final step in the Xenoplague plan unleashes the ultimate form of the Omega Strain upon the whole world.[br/][br/]Requires Omega Strain Level 3.[br/]
异星疫病的最后一步就是向整个世界释放终极毒株的终极形态。[br/][br/]需要终极毒株达到等级 3。[br/]
The target colony begins transmitting the call of the plague, summoning a Bloated Pustule into combat every turn for {duration} during battle in this colony's territory.
目标殖民地开始传播疫病呼唤，在战斗期间每回合在其领域内召唤一个浮肿脓包，持续 {duration}。
Your colony has begun transmitting the call of the plague - Bloated Pustules will be summoned onto the field during battle.
你的殖民地已开始传播疫病呼唤，战斗期间将在战场上召唤浮肿脓包。

Deploy a Xenobonic Plague Bomb in the target colony. The colony loses {XenobonicPlagueBombPop} and any non-Xenoplague Biological and Cyborg units in the colony get infected with [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] for {ParasiteStrategicDuration}.[br/]In addition, {PustuleSpawn} Xenoplague Pustules spawn near the colony.
在目标殖民地部署异星生物疫病炸弹。该殖民地失去 {XenobonicPlagueBombPop}，城市中的非异星疫病生物和半机械人单位受到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]，持续 {ParasiteStrategicDuration}。[br/]此外，殖民地附近将会生成 {PustuleSpawn} 个异星疫病脓包。
Infect all non-Xenoplague Biological and Cyborg units with Parasitic Infection for {ParasiteDuration}.
使所有非异星疫病生物和半机械人单位获得寄生感染，持续 {ParasiteDuration}。

Your agents have successfully deployed the Xenobonic Plague Bomb in the target colony. Its effects were catastrophic for your rival, decimating much of the colony's population and spawning several Xenoplague pustules in the vicinity.
你的特工已成功在目标殖民地部署了异星生物疫病炸弹。炸弹对敌方造成了灾难性的影响，杀死该殖民地内大部分居民，同时殖民地附近还出现了多个异星疫病脓包单位。

Your agents attempted to deploy the Xenobonic Plague Bomb in the enemy colony, but were caught in the act. Though they did not manage to detonate the bomb, the enemy's colonists have become restless due to our attempt.
你的特工尝试在敌方殖民地部署异星生物疫病炸弹时被抓住了。虽然特工没有成功引爆炸弹，但敌方殖民地居民因这次行动陷入了恐慌。
Enemy agents have committed a most vile act, detonating a Xenobonic Plague Bomb over your colony, killing many defenseless colonists and infecting them with the Xeno-strain!
敌方特工干了一件极其卑鄙的事。他们在你的殖民地中引爆了一枚异星生物疫病炸弹，杀害了大量手无寸铁的移住民并使他们感染了异星毒株病毒！

Enemy agents attempted to infiltrate your colony and were setting up a Xenobonic Plague Bomb before being caught by counteragents. Although the bombing attempt was thwarted, the colonists have become restless.
敌方特工在尝试入侵你的殖民地并安置异星生物疫病炸弹时被反特工人员抓住了。虽然敌方的轰炸企图失败了，但移住民还是为此焦躁不安。

Infect the target army with Sleeper Xenomomes. The target army suffers {SleeperXenomomesDamage} damage, and biological and cyborg units are afflicted with [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] for {SleeperXenomomesDuration}.
使用潜伏性异星病毒感染目标军队。目标军队受到 {SleeperXenomomesDamage} 伤害，此外生物和半机械人单位受到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]，持续 {SleeperXenomomesDuration}。
单位受到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]，持续 {duration}
On failure, the target army only suffers {SleeperXenomomesDamage} damage.
如果失败，则目标军队只会受到 {SleeperXenomomesDamage} 伤害。

Your agents have successfully dispersed the Sleeper Xenomomes into the target army, and the impact of the infection is weakening the army considerably. Now would be the ideal time to strike, while the infection is still fresh.
你的特工已成功将潜伏性异星病毒散播到目标殖民地。传染病极大程度地削弱了敌方军队。传染病依旧肆虐，现在是发动袭击的最佳时机。
Your agents have failed to disperse the Sleeper Xenomomes onto the target army, and although they did manage to inflict light damage, the infection did not take hold amongst the enemy's ranks.
你的特工在向目标军队散播潜伏性异星病毒时失败了。虽然他们设法造成了少量伤害，但传染病没能在敌人军队中肆虐。
Your army is struck by Sleeper Xenomomes, damaging and infecting your troops with a vile [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred].
你的军队被潜伏性异星病毒攻击了，你的部队受到了伤害并且受到了[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]。
Enemy agents attempted to disperse Sleeper Xenomomes onto your army. They were thwarted, but still managed to inflict light damage on the army.
敌方特工尝试向你的军队散播潜伏性异星病毒但失败了，不过我们的军队还是受到了少量伤害。

Infect target friendly army with a regenerative virus, healing them to full and granting them {RenerativeStimulantInjectionResistance} resistance to status effects for {RegenerativeStimulantInjectionDuration}.
使用再生病毒感染目标友方军队，恢复其全部生命值并给予其 {RenerativeStimulantInjectionResistance} 状态效果抵抗，持续 {RegenerativeStimulantInjectionDuration}。
Units gain {RenerativeStimulantInjectionResistance} resistance to status effects for {RegenerativeStimulantInjectionDuration}.
单位获得 {RenerativeStimulantInjectionResistance} 状态效果抵抗，持续 {RegenerativeStimulantInjectionDuration}。
Your distribution of the regenerative virus has had immediate effect, and your army is renewed and ready for combat.
你散布的再生病毒立刻产生了效果，军队如获新生蓄势待发。
This unit is affected by a regenerative virus and has {amount} resistance against status effects.
该单位受到再生病毒影响，拥有 {amount} 状态效果抵抗。
Accelerate the plague process of within the target Pustule, transforming it into a Destroyer.
加速目标脓包内的疫病进度，将其转化为毁灭者。
We administered a Xeno-concotion that accelerated the growth of one of our Xeno-Pustules, evolving it into a Destroyer.
我们掌握了一种异星混合物，可以加速异星脓包的增长并将其进化成毁灭者。
Unit has evolved into a Destroyer

Launch a bomb loaded with infected fungal spores. Target sector is terraformed to a Fungal sector, and a [abilityred]Spore Cloud[/abilityred] is spawned. This Hazard reduces economic income and weakens any units in the sector.
发射一枚装载真菌传染孢子的炸弹。目标区域将转变成真菌区域并生成一片[abilityred]孢子云[/abilityred]。这种灾害会减少经济收益并削弱位于该区域的单位。
We successfully launched the bomb into the target sector. The spores quickly took hold of the sector and terraformed it into Fungal terrain while filling the air with bio-spores.
我们已成功将炸弹投放到目标区域。孢子很快就占领了该区域并将其转变成了真菌地形，该区域空气中正弥漫着生化孢子。
The enemy has launched a spore-filled bomb into one of our sectors. The spores quickly took hold of the sector and terraformed it into Fungal terrain while filling the air with toxic fumes.
敌人已将一枚充满了孢子的炸弹投放至我们区域。孢子很快就占领了该区域并将其转变成了真菌地形，该区域空气中正弥漫着有毒烟雾。

Our bomb was intercepted by enemy defenseive systems, and failed to detonate properly. Some of the spores survived, and the environment has been permanently changed, but the spores have now harmlessly dissipated.
我们的炸弹被敌方防御系统阻截，未能正确引爆。只有一部分孢子存活了下来，该区域的环境发生了永久性变化，但孢子现在已经消散了。

The enemy has attempted to launch a spore-filled bomb into one of our sectors. Our defensive systems managed to prevent the bomb doing any serious damage, but the terrain in the area has been permanently changed.
敌人试图在我们的一个区域内投放孢子炸弹。我们的防御系统设法阻止了炸弹造成严重伤害，但该区域的地形发生了永久性变化。
On failure, target sector is only terraformed into Fungal terrain.
如果失败，目标区域仅会转变成真菌地形。
Killing enemies affected by [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] can now spawn Pustules under your control upon winning combat.
击杀受到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]影响的敌人可在战斗胜利后生成受你控制的脓包。
Killing enemies affected by [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] can now evolve Pustules under your control to Destroyers upon winning combat.
击杀受到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]影响的敌人可在战斗胜利后将脓包进化成受你控制的毁灭者。
Killing enemies affected by [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] can now evolve Destroyers under your control into Plague Lords upon winning combat.
击杀受到[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]影响的敌人可在战斗胜利后将毁灭者进化成受你控制的疫病领主。
One of our Omega Hives has been captured!
我们的一个终极蜂巢已被夺走！
You have lost an Omega Hive!
你失去了一个终极蜂巢！
You have lost an Omega Hive. Our attempt at unleashing the Omega Awakening has been canceled!
你失去了一个终极蜂巢。我们释放“终极觉醒”的计划被中止了！
{STR_Player} has lost an Omega Hive. Their attempt at unleashing the Omega Awakening has been foiled!
{STR_Player}失去了一个终极蜂巢。他们释放“终极觉醒”的计划失败了！
A Player has unleashed their Omega Awakening!
一名玩家释放了“终极觉醒”！
By building an Omega Hive, {playerName} now has access to their Doomsday Weapon, the Omega Awakening. It is weak now, but will become more powerful as more Omega Hives are constructed.
{playerName}通过建造终极蜂巢，现在可以使用末日武器“终极觉醒”了。虽然目前武器威力尚弱，但会随终极蜂巢数量的增多而变强。
By building a second Omega Hive, {playerName} has strengthened their Doomsday Weapon, the Omega Awakening. You should plan raids to destroy these structures before they become too powerful.
{playerName}通过建造第二座终极蜂巢强化了“终极觉醒”末日武器。你应当在这些建筑变得过于强大之前策划突袭并将其摧毁。

By building their final Omega Hive, {playerName} has maximized the strength of their Doomsday Weapon, the Omega Awakening. They are now close to unleashing it and winning the game. The time to strike is now!
{playerName}通过建造最后一座终极蜂巢使“终极觉醒”末日武器达到了最强的威力。该玩家马上就可以完全释放其力量来获得游戏胜利了。发动袭击就趁现在！
The Doomsday Timer has been paused! You must reclaim the lost Omega Hive, or you will lose your chance at unleashing the Omega Strain upon your enemies!
末日武器计时器已暂停！你必须夺回失去的终极蜂巢，否则你将失去向敌人释放“终极觉醒”的机会！
The loss of an Omega Hive has canceled the Omega Awakening, ending the Doomsday Timer.
终极蜂巢的丢失致使“终极觉醒”被取消，末日武器计时器也停止了运转。
The loss of an Omega Hive has weakened our Omega Awakening and your Doomsday operations have been canceled.
终极蜂巢的丢失削弱了“终极觉醒”的威力，你的末日行动遭到中止。

Our enemies have activated their Doomsday Weapon, the Omega Awakening has spread across the planet, and your own Doomsday Weapon has been wiped out by the cataclysm. You have {numTurns} to destroy one of their Omega Hives or they will win the game.
敌人激活了他们的末日武器，“终极觉醒”已经遍布全球。你的末日武器已在这场浩劫中被摧毁。你需要在 {numTurns} 内摧毁敌人的一个终极蜂巢，否则他们将获得游戏胜利。
The Omega Awakening is active, and you will win in {numTurns} unless you lose one of your Omega Hives.
“终极觉醒”已激活，只要不失去任何终极蜂巢，你将会在 {numTurns} 后获胜。
The Omega Awakening is active, and {playerName} will win in {numTurns} unless you can destroy one of their Omega Hives.
“终极觉醒”已激活，{playerName}将在 {numTurns} 后获胜，除非你能在此之前摧毁其一个终极蜂巢。
An Omega Hive has been captured! If it is destroyed, our Doomsday Timer will be canceled. If you recapture the Hive, you will be able to resume the countdown.
一个终极蜂巢已被夺走！如果终极蜂巢被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果你重新夺回终极蜂巢，计时器将会恢复。
An Omega Hive has been captured! If it is destroyed, the Doomsday Timer will be canceled. If {playerName} recaptures the Hive, they will be able to resume the countdown.
一个终极蜂巢已被夺走！如果终极蜂巢被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果{playerName}重新夺回终极蜂巢，计时器将会恢复。

{playerName} is priming their Omega Awakening Doomsday Weapon. If they are allowed to finish, your own Doomsday Weapon will be wiped out, and {playerName} will be but one step away from total victory!
{playerName}正在准备释放“终极觉醒”末日武器！如果成功释放，你的末日武器将被摧毁，{playerName}距离胜利也将仅剩一步之遥！

Feel the Xenos grow within you.[br/]The Alpha Strain’s symbiosis is complete.[br/]Your enemies become fertilizer[br/]as they succumb to your grand infection.[br/]Feast well - a thousand more Star Union planets[br/]await your ravenous spores.
感受异星疫病在你体内生长。[br/]初始毒株共生完成。[br/]当敌人臣服于你伟大的感染时[br/]他们将成为肥料。[br/]好好享用 - 星际联盟还有无数颗星球[br/]正等待着你饥饿的孢子。

This unit benefits from grafted Xenoplague muscles. Melee attacks do {GraftDamage}% extra damage and gain an extra level of [abilityblue]Stagger Impact[/abilityblue].[br/][br/]This mod also grants melee attacks a {InfectionChance}[strengthbio/] strength chance ({InfectionChanceRepeating}[strengthbio/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Parasitic Infection[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg units.[br/][br/]On a Xenoplague unit's melee ability or Xenoplague melee weapon, the strength chance is always {InfectionChance}[strengthBio/].

该单位获得异星疫病移植肌肉。近战攻击额外造成 {GraftDamage}% 伤害并额外获得 1 级[abilityblue]动摇冲击[/abilityblue]。[br/][br/]该模块还会使近战攻击有 {InfectionChance}[strengthbio/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {InfectionChanceRepeating}[strengthbio/] 几率）对生物和半机械人单位施加[abilityred]寄生感染[/abilityred]。[br/][br/]针对异星疫病单位的近战技能或近战武器时，力量几率始终为 {InfectionChance}[strengthBio/]。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
